title: New Details Revealed In University Of North Carolina Academic Scandal
teaser: At one of the most prestigious state universities in the country, there's new detail on a very dark chapter. An independent investigation at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill reveals new details of a long running scandal that involved thousands of students, phony classes and bogus grades.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
